amendment.description: Amendment sought to strike the section requiring all consumer complaints to be made available to the public on a CFPB website.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 6 printed in Part A of House Report 116-79 to strike the section requiring all consumer complaints to be made available to the public on a CFPB website.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Burgess amendment (A006) Failed by recorded vote: 191 - 236 (Roll no. 223).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A006) offered by Mr. Burgess.
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Burgess amendment (A006) Failed by recorded vote: 191 - 236 (Roll no. 223).
